about_the_game:
Prelude: 3 Weeks before...

Get a feel for Going Down without spoilers. Meet Alice and guide her through the recurring nightmare that haunts her every night.
See glimpses of repressed memories and try to piece together the mystery of Alice's past.

Beginning, Middle, And...

Instead of a small section of a much larger game, we decided to purpose build a prelude to the main story, so you won't feel as disappointed when the demo screeches to a halt. Play through the chapter in the dark life of Alice directly proceeding the events of the full game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains references to and dramatised depictions of depression and anxiety, including self harm, suicide, and coping mechanisms such as alcohol abuse.

name: Going Down Demo
short_description: Get a feel for Going Down without spoilers. Meet Alice and guide her through the recurring nightmare that haunts her every night preceding the events of Going Down.
